trends: There have been no other sightings in St. Michael
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright slow moving Venus like object. Midday. Clear blue sky. Silent, About 10-15 thousand feet up
divs: sighting detailsabout 11:40 am, on a clear blue sky beautifull day, i and 2-3 three other people noticed a bright star\venus like object moving slowly(30-50mph) due north to due south. very brightly reflecting the sun, or ceating it's own light. if i squinted, i was barely able to make out a silver cigar like body, very hard to see with the glare. altitude was about 10 thousand feet. i've never seen anything like it. i have an aviation background, so i'm familiar with aircraft. i was in the military for 10 years, as a flight operation specialist( atc). eventually(20 min) it got about 5 miles away, and was still brightly visable lower on the horizon. as i watched, it made some sudden turns, and sped away at a rate that i can barely explain. almost like going to warp drive. that is a crude referance, but that is the closest i can come to describing it. i have 20\20 or better vision, and i don't require glasses. i thought it may have been a drone aircraft at first, but why was it where it was, and the performance that it had when it left, was beyone what i know that unmanned drones can do. i is literally the first time that i saw something in the clear blue sky, that i could not identify. i also had 3 other witnesses. i believe one other was as intrigued as myself. the other 2 thought it may have been a helicopter. but it was too high and just did not fit was a copter sounds like or looks like. i have a helocopter aviation background, and i very familiar with them.
